response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value for me, but I understand its potential worth to you extends far beyond my expectations. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects a significant discount compared to its true market value and represents an excellent investment opportunity for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
